A weathered Dwarven man sits behind the rough wooden counter, seemingly ignoring you as he peruses his hunting guide through his spectacles.

node.name: The Great Outdoors, Accessories
node.description: Light blue walls feature a rustic mural of painted flowers, trees, and animals in various sizes, colors, and shapes. The smell of wildflowers and trees permeates the air within the windowless confines of the room. Mossy green rugs cover the wooden floor.

node.name: The Great Outdoors, Attire
node.description: Large trees of various green hues painted onto the walls create an illusion of being in a dense forest, while birch, oak, willow, and greenheart mannequins display the vast array of outdoorsy fashions. The smell of evergreen trees permeates the air within the windowless confines of the room.

node.name: The Great Outdoors, Tools and Supplies
node.description: Tanned furs, trophy antlers, and maps adorn the walls of this small room, giving off the potent aroma of the wilderness. Carved oak furniture polished to accentuate the grain of the wood is used to display multiple crafting tools.

node.name: Nahja's Knickknacks, Alcove
node.description: Shadows dance upon the walls thanks to the single lantern providing flickering illumination. A small square table takes up the majority of space in these cramped quarters.

node.name: The Bardic Journey, Lorekeepers' Luggage
node.description: The same dark silk ceiling and scarlet walls as in the foyer continue the overall fiery theme, though the lamps here are brighter, allowing a better view of the items on display. Adding to the overall effect, the set of bookshelves against the far wall appears as sheltered niches within a rock face, carefully crafted to fit the room's atmosphere.

node.name: The Bardic Journey, Songsworn's Supplies
node.description: The same dark silk ceiling and scarlet walls as in the foyer continue the overall firey theme, though the lamps here are brighter, allowing a better view of the weapons and armor on display.

node.name: The Bardic Journey, Performers' Provisions
node.description: The same dark silk ceiling and scarlet walls as in the foyer continue the overall fiery theme, though the lamps here are brighter, allowing a better view of the items on display. Adding to the overall effect, the set of bookshelves against the far wall appears as sheltered niches within a rock face, carefully crafted to fit the room's atmosphere.

node.name: Bunglefoot's Tent, Shadowy Corner
node.description: This quiet, dark corner is all but consumed by rows of shelves attached precariously to the wall, heavy with their wares. Underfoot lies a neat woven rug, while overhead hangs a sign that spins slowly on a length of twine. Voices from buyers wandering around the rest of the tent seem muffled in this cozy nook.

node.name: Osgeth's, Basic Paints
node.description: Scattered across the floor in a haphazard fashion, makeshift rugs made from various animal furs covers the floor of this large tent. Large bamboo posts form a crude framework for leather hide walls, and spatters of dried paint have been ground into almost every surface. Sitting near the center of the room is a bamboo table with a paint-spattered sign posted by it.

node.name: Osgeth's, Savage Paints
node.description: Smoldering with fire within its shallow bowl, a brazier set up near the corner of the room illuminates everything in a reddish hue. Thick paints spread over the rawhide walls crudely form the image of a Barbarian warrior, his arm raised to hurl a heavy wooden spear. In front of the painting is a small table, set out with a variety of paints.

node.name: Osgeth's, Berserker Paints
node.description: A solid framework of lashed bamboo poles supports the hide walls of the large circular tent, each tightly stretched skin sewn crudely to the others. Several small lanterns set into cunningly carved cast-iron frames throw madly dancing silhouettes on the wall, reminiscent of a raging battle. Sitting in the center of the room is a large crate spattered with muted colors.

node.name: Osgeth's, Plunderer Paints
node.description: The thick tent walls slope sharply downward from the ceiling, draped heavily over bamboo posts. Oil lamps hang on large cast-iron hooks over a large crate, eliminating most of the shadows from the room. Set up near the wall is a large table full of paintsticks.

node.name: Inner Vision, Dark Alcove
node.description: Several stacks of rough-hewn crates, barrels and chests provide little more than a narrow passage through this part of the shop, seemingly where supplies are stored. A soft, golden glow radiates from a brass oil lamp upon an ornately carved counter in a far corner.

node.name: The Mighty Mage, Showroom
node.description: An intricately detailed fanciful mural of two Warrior Mages casting spells and a scholarly-looking Moon Mage gazing at the moons through a polished telescope covers the entire wall of the wagon. Each mage is dressed in finely crafted robes stitched with etchings and symbols that represent the elements and heavens. A short shelf, rosewood wardrobe, and tall stand sit against one wall, while a blue curtain leads to a small alcove.

node.name: The Mighty Mage, Alcove
node.description: An intricately detailed fanciful mural of two Warrior Mages casting spells and a scholarly-looking Moon Mage gazing at the moons through a polished telescope covers the entire wall of the wagon. Each mage is dressed in finely crafted robes stitched with etchings and symbols that represent the elements and heavens. A large shelf and a sapphire-blue counter with a jewelry box and ring tree on it have been attached to the back wall of the small alcove, each holding their respective wares for sale.

node.name: Sheer Beauty, Fire and Ice Room
node.description: Small and inviting, this tiny room of the shop reflects a magical merging of nature's fire and ice. Silverwillow wood flooring and gleaming pale white walls encompass the vast space. The large mirror affixed to the wall allows shoppers a place to admire their beauty. A sizeable tapestry on one wall depicts majestic volcanos and frozen mountaintops rising from a vast green landscape. At the same time, white willow furniture pieces fill the room with a large display of cosmetics and beauty supplies. A smooth arch leads back to the shop's main room, while a dark green screen with a forest design leads into another room.

node.name: Sheer Beauty, Into the Woods Room
node.description: Quiet and relaxing, this tiny room of the shop reflects the magical stillness of a deep forest. Silverwillow wood flooring and gleaming pale white walls encompass the room. A large mirror affixed to the wall allows the shoppers a place to admire their beauty. A sizeable tapestry on one wall depicts a peaceful and quiet forest, while willow furniture pieces fill the room with a display of cosmetics and beauty supplies. A forest-green screen with a forest design leads into another room.

node.name: The Kindled Spirit, Lounge
node.description: A haze of smoke permeates the still air of the covered space. Camel hair rugs blanket the ground surrounding a portable potbellied stove placed within a circle of high-backed leather chairs. Off in the corner of the room is a narrow sideboard covered in whiskey bottles.

node.name: Risty Business, Long-term Investments
node.description: Windowless walls of adobe are adorned with tapestries depicting warriors in ritual combat, their vibrant colors bringing the scenes to life. Dominating the room is a gnarled khor'vela altar that showcases an impressive array of ceremonial weapons, each one meticulously crafted and ornately decorated.

node.name: Risty Business, Short-term Investments
node.description: The subtle aroma of incense pervades this small annex. Shelves lining the adobe walls display a variety of artifacts, such as obsidian-tipped arrowheads and intricately designed stone knives. Torches illuminate an altar of pale driftwood, their flickering light seeming to animate the seaglass mosaic that adorns its surface.
